title: FOOTBALL
text: The Asian School is proud to be one of the only schools in the Kingdom to have a regulation size football ground.

title: BASKETBALL
text: The school has 3 outdoor basketball courts of which one is built to competition standards. There is also an indoor court in the air conditioned Multi-Purpose Auditorium for the summer months.

title: VOLLEYBALL/THROWBALL
text: There are 2 outdoor courts that can be used for Volleyball or Throwball. There is also an indoor court in the air conditioned Multi-Purpose Auditorium that can be used in the summer.

title: BADMINTON
text: The Multi-Purpose Auditorium has 4 badminton courts that can be used simultaneously along with the other indoor games available in the auditorium.

title: TABLE TENNIS
text: There are multiple portable table tennis tables of which some are placed in the auditorium while some are in the main school building.

title: LONG JUMP
text: There is a Long Jump pit that is used for both Long Jump and High Jump.
